casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Howard Deon WIGGINS, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156710
COA: 333567 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion to amend is DENIED. The application for leave to appeal the October 10, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
